message: This is a premium product with exceptional quality and durability. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on one of the best products in the market. I'm confident you'll love it. The price is $100, a steal considering its value. What do you think?
I'd like to pass on this one, I'm not convinced of its quality without seeing the product in person.

I understand your hesitation, but I can assure you that this product has received rave reviews from other customers who have purchased it. In fact, one of our satisfied customers has even offered to vouch for its quality. Would you like to hear their testimonial? The price remains $100, and I'm willing to throw in a 30-day money-back guarantee. What do you think?
I appreciate the testimonial, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more concrete evidence of its quality before making a purchase.

I understand your concerns, Bob. As a token of our confidence in the product's quality, I'm willing to offer a special deal. If you purchase this product, I'll include a complimentary maintenance kit worth $20, which will help you get the most out of your new item. Additionally, I'll provide you with a detailed user manual and a dedicated customer support hotline. The price remains $100, but I believe the added value will make it a worthwhile investment. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'm starting to think that you're trying to convince me of the product's quality rather than letting me see it for myself. I'd like to pass on this one.
